titleStmt.title: John W. Barker to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2912

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Requisitions for the Return of Fugitives from Justice, 1859-1861

body.p:
Jeffersonville Ind
July 30. 1861
His Excellency
Gov B. Magoffin
Sir
Enclosed find requisition from Gov Morton for the body of Frank Smith who now awaits your order in the Louisville jail.
Will you please issue the order and have the same mailed to me at this place?
